name: Dig the Onion
description:
Ya want to slice da onion to make a delicious onion tart but it will make ya cry all the tears of yar body... Controls
  • Mouse: left click to drag cards and press buttons
Softwares & ressources
  • Unity & Visual Studio
  • Krita
  • Tracktion Waveform & Audacity
  • Font: https://www.dafont.com/fr/schoolwork.font
Credits

Video game made for Ludum Dare 48!

  • Coding, implementation & game design:  Votre Pseudo
  • Drawings, animations & shaders: Hyblis29
  • Sounds, music, drawings, animations & game design: Klosenlinks

Thanks for playing! Feel free to leave a feedback ☺
